short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fills alt text for images that are missing the alt tag

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alt Text Filler is a tool designed to enhance web accessibility. It enables you to add alt text to images that are missing it or to improve the accessibility of existing images using GPT-4 Vision Preview. Please note that using this extension requires obtaining an API key with available credits from OpenAI.
